thread.section_title: Aloft London Excel - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: ARLA Conference
thread.title_full: ARLA Conference - Review of Aloft London Excel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CGMM13
title: ARLA Conference
text: After a hellish drive down from Lancashire it was a relief to be able to park easily and reed and be greeted by friendly efficient staff who got me registered and up to my room in record time. A bright immaculately clean room awaited. Would thoroughly recommend for business travellers with excellent facilities.
